Roofy G

Welcome

We turn Egypts empty rooftops into productive farms. Edible crops only (flowers = optional accessories). Rooftop owners pay nothing and receive 20% of product profit. Suppliers who donate inputs receive 10% of monthly yield. Each neighborhood forms a volunteer team with kid-friendly events.

Why it helps Egypt

  • Cooler buildings (less AC use).
  • Local jobs & training near home.
  • Less pressure on food imports (keep dollars inside Egypt).

Your Share

Owners: 20% of net profit per rooftop.

Supplier pool: 10% of monthly yield value.

Ops/Workers: remaining after supplier pool.
